abstract: South African judge convicts former tennis champion Bob Hewitt of raping three girls while serving as their coach.
lead_paragraph: A judge in South Africa convicted Bob Hewitt, 75, a 15-time Grand Slam doubles champion, of raping three girls he had been coaching.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Former Player Is Convicted

snippet: A judge in South Africa convicted Bob Hewitt, 75, a 15-time Grand Slam doubles champion, of raping three girls he had been coaching.
